column4: hi can anyone help me i installed ubuntu as a guest os in virtualbox and i cant manage to share a folder
how is the network configured in VB ?
do you have openSSH in Ubuntu ?
in Windows ? oh, you'll have to use SAMBA
give total permissions on both folders
when you right-click on the folder to share, do you did you check all the 3 options ?
yes, how do you have the network set in virtualbox ?
for each virtual machine, you have settings. Go to each settings, Network, and set it to Bridget Adapter
